name: places/ChIJRZoWAYP2wokREfO4kAKxgs8
formattedAddress: 1026 St Nicholas Ave, New York, NY 10032, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1026 St Nicholas Ave, New York, NY 10032, USA

originalText.text: This is a mixed review.  I love this laundromat. Even though they recently got rid of the debit/credit option on the machines in favor of a card system. It's spacious and clean and has ample seating. But,  this morning I was waiting for my wash to finish when a woman came in with several bags of laundry, informed the attendant that she had bedbugs, and paid for pickup service.  ðŸ™„ They took her partially open garbage bags into their office to weigh them. This is where they keep clean orders for pickup and also where they fold clothes... all of which may be crawling with bedbugs now. I have to find a new place now. ðŸ˜©

originalText.text: Extremely rude staff, half of the machines are always broken, and the other half never seems to wash your clothes properly. The only good thing about this place is that you can pay with a credit card instead of cash.

text.text: Extremely rude staff, half of the machines are always broken, and the other half never seems to wash your clothes properly. The only good thing about this place is that you can pay with a credit card instead of cash.

originalText.text: best laundromat around. newer washing machines in various sizes, nice cool a/c, wifi didn't work for me because due to IP issues, but there were plenty of TVs, public bathroom is as clean as a public bathroom can be. great prices. they have $6, $4 and $2.25 machines.

text.text: best laundromat around. newer washing machines in various sizes, nice cool a/c, wifi didn't work for me because due to IP issues, but there were plenty of TVs, public bathroom is as clean as a public bathroom can be. great prices. they have $6, $4 and $2.25 machines.

originalText.text: Hate to post this but come on! Handful of machines out of service or only coins. Avoid the weekends itâ€™s so busy, late weekdays are the best to get in and outâ€¦

originalText.text:
Worst Laundrymat in the neighborhood, stay away. Terrible customer service and money scam. They just changed their card system without notice and refuse to refund you the money on your cards. They force you to pay again for their new card. Never a manager there no matter the time or day.

Update:
Normally, I wouldn't reply, but there are so many inaccuracies in the owner's response that it deserves to be addressed.

There has NOT been plenty of notice because AS I STOOD THERE FOR AN HOUR, pleading my concern to the employee, ANOTHER CUSTOMER came in with the previous card and was DUMBFOUNDED by the "new system" . However she was an older spanish lady who was told in Spanish that she had to buy a new card thus she paid reluctantly.

My money from the previous system was NOT "gladly" transferable, as never explained by the staff. The lady REFUSED, with plenty of attitude, to transfer anything unless I pay for another card, even though I already paid for two cards.

The only bonus you get on the new system comes from adding $20 and getting $2 free, and I'm literally begging for a refund, I'm not paying $20 more.

The staff provided me a card as a curtesy AFTER AN HOUR OF TALKING BACK AND FORTH WITH THE LADY, EVEN THEN NOTHING HAPPENED UNTIL AFTER I POSTED MY REVIEW AND THEN A MANAGER TEXTED HER.

"Thank you for being a valued customer." This is laughable as I was TOLD NEVER TO COME BACK AGAIN.

A simple "I apologize" would've been an infinitely better response.
